name: nutrition-database
description: PostgreSQL database setup and JSON data loading for nutrition app

scripts.validate: node -e "const {Pool} = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({user: process.env.POSTGRES_USER || 'nutrition_user', host: process.env.POSTGRES_HOST || 'localhost', database: process.env.POSTGRES_DB || 'nutrition_app', password: process.env.POSTGRES_PASSWORD || 'nutrition_password', port: process.env.POSTGRES_PORT || 5432}); pool.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products').then(r => console.log('Products:', r.rows[0].count)).catch(console.error).finally(() => pool.end());"
scripts.check-connection: node -e "const {Pool} = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({user: process.env.POSTGRES_USER || 'nutrition_user', host: process.env.POSTGRES_HOST || 'localhost', database: process.env.POSTGRES_DB || 'nutrition_app', password: process.env.POSTGRES_PASSWORD || 'nutrition_password', port: process.env.POSTGRES_PORT || 5432}); pool.query('SELECT NOW()').then(() => console.log('✅ PostgreSQL connected')).catch(err => console.error('❌ Connection failed:', err.message)).finally(() => pool.end());"
